forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the air is filled with the kind of brightness that hints at warmth, yet an underlying coolness stirs. The sun glistens through a clear sky, carpeting the city with a gentle light, though a westerly wind briskly stirs the sea-salt air, playful yet firm at twenty-two miles per hour. As the afternoon meanders, temperatures will hover around the comforting mid-sixties, giving a warm embrace before the evening chill settles in. As night approaches, expect the clouds to gather, blanketing the vibrant skyline under a cloak of softness, with temperatures nudging down to a cool fifty-four. 

With the forecast promising a delightful balance of sun and clouds, it's an opportune moment to don a light sweater over that casual tee and perhaps slide into your favorite jeans or chinos; layers are your ally as the day shifts. As the city softly illuminates with evening lights, consider wandering to a cozy café where the warmth of good coffee and good company can be savored under the draped stars and the murmurs of the wind sighing through the streets. The quietude of the city, shaded by darkness and a hint of mystery, invites a slow-paced exploration, perfect for an evening stroll to gather one’s thoughts or share a conversation that feels just a little more intimate against the backdrop of this lovely, shifting San Francisco evening.
